item.title: About Me
item.description: Myself Suraj Bhosale, I am a software engineer by profession, currently working at Coriolis Technologies Pvt Ltd, I’ve been working as a freelancer since my academics. Currently working as a Golang Developer with cloud platforms like AWS, Vmware, Azure at Coriolis Technologies. My current core work domain is Data Security, Cryptography.
